attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Brown's deathly looks impose a ghastly atmosphere each week in Parliament, and most importantly in other places on the world's stage. These shortcomings cannot be helped, nor should they be. But a nice, hearty moustache should set him apart as the evil imperialist, elevating PM proudly over novice, Mr. Cameron.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
